projects.title: Development of conversational Sanskrit translator using Neural Machine Translation
projects.description: The work involves creating a corpus with a large number of Sanskrit-to-Hindi and Sanskrit-to-English sentences to develop a Sanskrit-to-Hindi translator using Neural Machine Translation . There by we wish to develop a Sanskrit-to-English translator and investigate translation to other Indic languages via 2-step translation using Sanskrit-to-Hindi translator
